title: Interview with Mark Simonson
content:
I had the pleasure of inteviewing typographer and lettering artist Mark Simonson last Friday. The interview can be read here:   
   
 [http://www.eurekaville.com/blog/2005/04/interview-mark-simonson.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012112702/http:/www.eurekaville.com/blog/2005/04/interview-mark-simonson.html)   
   
Enjoy.
author: walkman
